lines.text: And the traveller said, "how tainted is this land, how much evil has been committed here? For evil knows no boundaries, and manifests itself in many guises. I cannot live among contaminated minds, lest the contagion enter my soul.
And the traveller said, "and so much evil was committed here that even the innocent who passed this way soon reeked of the sickness. The contagion had ended their souls."
